content.detailedDescription: At 7pm i went outside with my canon 7mp powershot sd550, to my backyard to take pictures of the clouds after a storm, during sunset. later as i was checking my pictures i noticed two objects hovering at a distance i'm not sure of. when i downloaded the picture to my computer is when i realized i took a picture of a ufo. i went outside again to see the area of the picture i took but i saw nothing. i think i didn't see the objects when i was taking pictures because at the time i was not wearing my glasses.
content.summary: I was outside taking pictures of the clouds, after a storm, during sunset.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
7/7/08  10:05pm-ish 
a triangle sighting... tampa palms (north tampa) florida on bruce b. downs super walmart.

i was walking out of walmart, and i saw a bubble... so i thought. at first it seemed to be about 25 feet off the ground and about 50' ahead of me. i kept walking toward it to where my car was... and as i stared at the bubble i wondered "how would one lone bubble survive out here too long? i walked... expecting to see it burst any second. it didn't. as i watched it... i then saw it wasn't a bubble at all as it started to get almost above me. i stood next to the car. 

it had been cloudy and drizzy... and there was a low canopy of clouds. i noticed it had two round looking lights and a lighter third. nothing blinking. the lights were very clear... not like you'd expect headlights on a plane. i listened for sound... and heard nothing. then i suspected i was seeing something unusual. i then checked... and true nothing blinking... and watched and made study that the lights were not real bright but were very pronounced... without halo or atmospheric glaring quality. the blueish roun lights seem to be directional... as like laser light travels, defined. then as it started to get over walmart... and by then i knew it was not a plane or chopper. i hoped it was a black triangle and i watched to see something that would reveal it. then... it slowed down very gradually... and before it had a chance to stop... it ascended straight up. i appeared to have traveled fast up than it had since i spotted it. as it moved up, the position of the lights stayed fixed... meaning that it didn't turn nose up to ascend. it went up what looked like around 1000' until it pierced the cloud cove and disappeared.  no noise.I detected no shape to it... but the lights suggested a triangle. a plane climbing like that would have made noise. this thing moved silent and very smoothly. it matched the triangle video taped at zephyrhills a couple months ago... very close... minus the blinking read light. i'm glad i saw it... because now i know they are real. i immediately text messaged a friend to time stamp the sighting. i did a photoshop of what i saw attached.
content.summary: A triangle sighting over walmart

content.detailedDescription:
Every night after i use the bathrooom, i always look out my back window into my backyard.
at approx 5:00am-- what i saw was so amazing i woke up my children - (then 14 & 11)  andcalled my next door neighbors.  
about 30 feet beyond my window there are many trees-in a wooded area--i saw a hovering disc shaped object with orange & yellow blinking lights.
it seemed to be scanning the ground.  there were also yellow blinking lights going back
& forth in about a 10 yard stretch from my neighbors property to mine.  this entire
episode lasted about an hour until daybreak -then either it disappeared or was not
visible.  i called my local police to see if anyone else reported this siting-they said no.
but 2 officers came over to my house & looked around but saw nothing--the next day
my neighbor & i walked into the woods where i had seen the siting & again there was
no indication of anything being there where i saw it.

i was constantly being teased for what i saw --like i made it up --but to this day
i still have a very vivid memory of that startling experience.  and i do believe it
was something that cannot be explained..  i feel  very fortunate to have witnessed
such an extradinary site.  it gives me the chills when i recall the episode.
content.summary: I saw a hovering object with yellow & orange blinking lights in my backyard

content.detailedDescription:
This happened over a small lake in the middle of amish farm country. this description is very odd, unbeliveable and mind boggling. here is what happened.
while staying at a cottage for a small family gathering we hopped on the family pontoon boat. it was around the 4pm hour. this lake is very small and is surrounded by small cottages and a farm. as we spun around for our second around the lake i saw what looked like a blackish grey triangle shaped fighter jet come banking out of the tree line from the west. because i thought i was seeing things, i nudged the person sitting next to me and pointed to the object now flying towards the north. what they said was "i hope its not iraqi". what was so odd besides a black fighter triangle jet basically coming out of the trees in front of us in the middle of nowhere, was that there was no noise from the plane or object. there was no markings, lights, windows. it happened just like that and it was gone. also, what was interesting is that it came out of the tree line on a tilted angle so i was looking at it as a whole object. it was not shiny, it was dull and flew at a very high speed.
 
later on that evening around 9:30 pm, i decided to go sit on the now docked on the pier pontoon boat and take pictues of the moon in the west. i was out there for awhile taking pictures while the rest of the family was on the shore. my cameras were not taking good pictures because it was getting dark so i brought them inside the house. i decided to go sit back on the boat and enjoy the millions of stars that were now in the sky.
 
as i sat facing north i turned my attention to the east sky because i noticed what looked like a huge white light blinking on and off as well as smaller orange starlike lights blinking on and off and moving around. at first i thought it may be a plane and or fireworks. but it wasnt, this blinking white light then blinked on and moved towards the smaller orange lights that kept moving into several foramtions. triangles, squares. in the binculors these lights looked like they were 4 dots that formed a square. while this was happening, then some of these orange lights started moving to the north tree line away from the formation. as these orange lights made there way to the tree line other orange lights appeared from the tree line as though they were meeting. then all of a sudden these orange lights dropped what was an object atleast 3 times its size from itself. these objects were glowing red and had 3 parts to them. the glowing red pulsating objects were dropped into the trees. as they dropped inside the tree they got smaller and turned white. they just hovered there. another one of these pulsating lights just hovered over the tree line. i was going crazy in awe, alittle scared and trying to watch two seperate sightings at once!! thats when my friend came to see me on the boat. i pointed to this pulsating red object over the tree line and it started moving to the other formation still going on in the east. my friend saw this and got scared and left. this was so crazy!!!!

just as this red pulsating light went into the other foramtion all the lights in that formation just went crazy and started moving around and made more formations. then from behind me i see what i thought were 3 helicopters flying in a straight line towards this formation in the east. these objects were red, orange and yellow and made no noise. i thought this is it and really got scared!!!!!!
the first one of these objects stopped dead just before it reached this light formation in the east. the other 2 objects that were following all melted into this first object and then it proceeded to join the formation in the east. it started fading into a smaller orange light. this foramtion slowly faded almost one by one light until it was gone. the other lights in the north were still there and also in the trees as it seemed like they were watching. 

please note that this was a family gathering and there were many children there and were kept unaware. at least 2 other adults witnessed something and we kept it under wraps because we did not want to scare them. this was the most incredible, amazing and scary experience ever!!!
content.summary: Black triangle object, orange spheres dropping red pulsating objects, 3 different formations all meeting

content.detailedDescription: I saw one during a thunderstorm, june 13 or 14 2008 about 00:45. it flew directly overhead at about 200 to 300 feet altitude. it was triangular with a bright white light at each corner, black or dark grey in color. in the center there appeared to be a circular opening with a dim reddish orange glow inside. this circular opening was surrounded by small white lights. in the center of the back edge there was a rectangular red light that didn't blink. the back edge of the craft was perfectly straight from side to side. this craft was at least 100 feet wide. form a distance of a mile it looked like the top of a huge a cell phone tower with bright white lights at each corner. the lights were perpendicular, like cell phone antenna. it hovered about 200 to 300 feet above ground. as we passed it by, we noticed it was huge, way too big to be a cell phone tower, and something we had never seen before. i drove less than two miles. dropped off my passenger at johns bar, and turned around. on the way back it flew directly overhead. this event was witnessed on m-15 between bay city and munger michigan near russel rd. the night of the thunderstorm during the weekend of june 13th.
content.summary: I saw a large triangular craft during a thunderstorm.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the yard with my dog it was 4.10am on july 8,2008 and i looked up in the sky and saw four lights this time, three that looked like two eyes and a nose bright head lights and a little father away but it was part of the object a pink color light at the front of the object. and i saw like a blue fog out  which i will call the back of the object, it looked like it was shinning lights around i watched for over 40min just moved slowly through the sky not leaving it space to much. i thought i saw silver flakes falling down into the tree tops and after a while the flakes went back up to the object. i thought it was lighten bugs or fireflys. but it went back up.Near the craft. it was still up there when i went to bed, i tried to take pictures again they look to black .It made no noice,moes quickly small areas,i get a little nervous being out there to long.This is the forth time i have seen  ufos in the levittown area since april/it was very overcast so i couldn't get a good look at the sides of the object,every once in a while a quick glimpse. color sides
content.summary: I was out with my dog he woke me up again,saw the light in the sky three bright ones

content.detailedDescription:
i was in line waiting to enter the nippon budokan to view a title boxing match. while i was in  the line i decided to take out my 6.0 mega pixel digital sony camera that was locked on to my belt and take a picture of the front of the building to keep as a souvener. i took the picture. i then took a quick look at the picture in my camera. a few seconds later i took a second look because i had seen something else on the top right coner of the picture. suddenly a strange feeling just jolted up my body. like when the hairs of your back just shoot right up. the feeling was very unpleasent . my body told me to look up so then i did. 
       that was when i saw the silver disk like shape. the hovering disk was emitting some sort of eerie black shade underneath it i don't know what it was. my eyes just went wide open, i began to sweat . the flying object was just hovering in mid air at a great distance from the floor for a couple of seconds. i quickly turned to tap the gentleman that was next to me to look. when i looked back, the flying disk was gone. no sign whatsoever of it. i later started thinking that maybe it was a result of the years in boxing that made me see things. but now i now that it was no imagination because i have a picture of it.
content.summary: Silver saucer like shape

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i saw what appeared tobe fire floating through the sky at slow speed at a relatively high altitude (it ultimately disappeared into the clouds). it's hard to describe what i saw because i've never seen anything like it. i saw the exact same object 3 days earlier flying in the opposite direction at aproximately the same time. at the time of the sighting i was sitting in the back yard after ariving home from work. i noticed the object because of how bright it was. all of this was very confusing to the two of us because neither one of us had any idea of what we were looking at.
content.summary: Slow moving object looked like a plain on fire. saw the exact same object 3 days ealier at the same time moving in the opposite direction

content.detailedDescription: Outside on the driveway locking truck. saw bright colors as soon as i went to the rear of the truck. looked up in the sky saw 2 yellow/orange objects. one was bigger then the other. thought it might be a shooting star. sat in same spot for approx. 10mins. didnt move then both objects went upward and disappeared. did leave a trail in a boomerang shape. i sat outside for 10 more mins mostly in shock and didnt see anything again.
content.summary: Yellow/orange glow in sky 1 big 1 small

content.detailedDescription:
Cl note: need to know the time of day of the event
cl note: need to know the duration of the event

the following is ff's initial account, taken from his narration
===============================================================
up to this time i had been reasonably sure that if i had been abducted it was only once. however, while doing some work on the gps trails for fishing i got another shock. i had found a way to put the trails on my map program. the map of upper carlyle lake had an odd pattern on it, a rapidly moving curve that takes me over the railroad track and back! as i looked at it, i remembered that when i had gone under the bridge i had stopped and opened a map. what i had seen was that there were many stumps sticking out of the water and i needed to find the main channel and as much as possible follow it. 

suddenly, without any memory of getting there, i found myself well into the lake section going in the wrong direction. i was quite confused. i remember waving my hands up and down. because i was unsure, as to what side of the bridge i was on. i got the map out again and a compass straightened myself out and inexplicably proceeded to suppress the seemingly sudden position change. i then got back to exploring and fishing the area. the date was october 28, 1999. this date came from my fishing log. this is the only time i fished in this area of carlyle lake in a boat.

 i do not remember anything about the trip over the tracks, which requires the boat to be airborne! when i looked at the trail on the map the memory of the position change came back as if unlocking a safe and seeing a long forgotten item. as time went by, i remembered more details of the position change. 

the degree on confusion and disorientation is reflected in what i did. a compass is not needed on the north side of carlyle���s railroad bridge. all one has to do is to line the map up with the bridge. i should have known what side of the bridge i was on by the many stumps sticking above the water. how someone can suppress an event of this magnitude i do not know but in several of the cases i have read about this is exactly what happens. as in these incidents, it took many months or over a year before something jarred my memory.
content.summary: 1999 "flying fisherman" carlyle lake ce4

content.detailedDescription:
My experience was and continues to be lifechanging beyond prior belief. i had recently made some startling discoveries regarding the human dillemma of this planet- i had also came to the solid conclusion that the extra terrestrial presence is very much a reality. in late march, i was driving home from arroyo seco [mountain village on highway 150] to my home in des montes. the topic of extraterrestrials came up during our ride, and almost simultaneously my co-worker pointed to a flashing orb hovering over the taos metropolitan area. this did not come as a surprise, but it sure was exciting. we spotted several of these lights surrounding the taos county airport on the mesa, and proceeded to drive there. when we arrived to the airport, as if it were all just a mirage, they "turned off", nowhere to be seen. to our dissapointment, we left. along our way home, we decided to stop at the rio grande gorge bridge. after sitting in the car for several minutes we saw a similiar orb "turn on", and moved in ways that defied "common logic". from this orb emerged three, it literally split into three. a strong energy seemed to surround us, enveloping our physical body in waves of essence. symbols began appearing in my mind, i then understood that these lights were not only extra terrestrial, they are extra dimensional. going home amazed, i felt a sense that i would see "them" again. sure enough, i have had countless et experiences since this time, if anything i say the presence is increasing in visibility and connection to myself, and those around me. i don't know too much about my new friends in the skies, but i do know that they are there because i can simply feel their presence. they leave my younger brothers gifts, as well as myself and my girlfriend. countless witnesses to this local phenomenon are gradually evolving telepathically, emotionally, and mentally. many are getting in touch with the star brothers themselves, many are channeling extra terrestrial viewpoints and perspectives. this includes the pleiadians, andromedans, sirans, and other benevolent et civilizations. i am willing to assist anyone who desires to educate themselves with the true knowledge of the universe. our higher self is our greatest teacher! 

ct- new mexico
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Progressive contact starting march 28th - nm

content.detailedDescription: Look on youtube under username scieptic.  video title "which one of these just doesn't belong".  object in question appears under subtitle "what's this? in the video.
content.summary: Small orb of varying brightness travelling east to west

content.detailedDescription:
I did not witness this event but was on the phone with the person who did as it happened. 
at 11 pm edt, my friend tom b. called me and requested that i go out side with the phone and look up in the sky to the east. he said he was viewing two big amber or orange globe-like lights moving slowly across the sky toward the southeast. i did as he requested but my view was blocked by trees. as i attempted to get a better look, tom informed me over the phone that they had just vanished "into thin air."  he said he had stepped out of his front door just before eleven and saw the lights above the apartments across from his. tom said they were large, dime sized globes, amber or orange in color about 1000 feet apart and low in the sky. they were making no sound and moving very slowly. he then called me and watched as they moved to the southeast sky and vanished without warning. he said they were round and globe-like and definitely not like anything he had ever seen before. later, we learned that another person living several blocks away had seen them as well. it should be noted here that tom also lives further down the street from me, about 200 yards away toward the east.
while telling this story to my friend rick d. this morning, he informed me that he and his mother had seen apparently the same or similar globe lights on the evening of june 19 at about 9:30 pm and these lights were directly over their heads in the back yard. they were exactly the same in description and completely silent. they were stationary and then moved slowly to the north and then suddenly changed color to a glowing white and zoomed off at intense speed to the north and out of sight. this occurred on a street to the north of mine in east palestine. another person know to my friend sighted the same lights that night of june 19 north of town by the water tower. all witnesses said they were taken by surprise and all said that these "globes" were impossible to confuse with any craft they were familiar with. they also said that these objects were more like some kind of lights and not like anything resembling crafts. rick and his mother, who observed them directly overhead said they looked like transparent amber globes but intensely bright. all the witnesses i have spoken to are willing to tell their stories and reveal their indentities to any investigtors.
content.summary: Two spherical amber globe-like lights were seen moving from north to souteast very slowly and then suddenly vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking up at the stars last night i noticed a flashing pulsars then 3 more , i rarely saw four in a straight line from east to west, so i decided to retrieve my telescope celestron 130 slt  with 2x barlow lens with plossl fully coated 12.5mm and noticed they were or seemed to be rotating and flashing like a siren all type of torques colors blue green red white called my wife out to take a look and a few friends were all equally amazed , i took 20 pics and 5 movie clips was there for a good hour and a half and then they all disappeared .

i panned the skies for another hour i wanted to explain it before i went to bed couldn't find it.  however i noticed a lot of what appeared to be satellites (white dots, star like) zipping across the sky in all directions it seemed every few minutes another one would cross the viewfinder path moved to quickly to see through telescope so i grabbed my binoculars some would disappear or fade out before 15* to horizon other would make it all the way asuuming they continued i can only follow to about 5 degrees.  
still curious i grabbed my night vision single scope made in russia night owl optics give a pretty big view plus 10 x 35 mag.  i haven���t found away to take pics through it but will come up with something what i saw was pretty amazing,  i aimed into the sky ( above my head) then flipped on infa-red within a minute i began seeing moving white dots (all stars look like white dots  through the night vision some lager then others, lots of them) i was telling myself this must be normal a lot of debris up there norad claims to be track like 9000 pieces perhaps it was the suns reflection hitting this debris? i don���t know, will invest in a night vision camera..
content.summary: 4 flashing orbs green  blue   red white rotating fast

content.detailedDescription: I was in sedona visiting my brother and his fiancee. it's really hot there, so they wait until late evening to go out. we were driving to a place called red rock crossing, and i was taking photos of the mountain landscapes out the window along our drive. i had my camera set to "sports", so it can capture images while moving wihtout blurring them. the next day, i uploaded my photos to my computer and was looking at them, to weed out the good shots and delet the crappy ones. anyway, in one shot, i noticed a werid diamond shaped cloud, and a weird rectangle to the left with what looked like a rectangle shadow above it and to the right. i went into photoshop and brought up the contrast to try and see the weird shapes more clearly, and cropped them. i emailed them to some about 5 people, one who is an astronomer, and nobody knew what it was. nobody knew. but, the last night of my trip, my brother had a party. i showed the photo to some locals and one guy told me to turn the photo sideways (landscape to the right) and zoom in to the diamond, becuase he said some "ships" fly sideways. sure enough, it looks like a saucer!!!!!!!!! alos, i noticed more rectangles in the shot to the right. the upper right sectoion and another one really low to the horizon on the right. there are some shadows of dots, but that might just be birds or something.  anyway,  the diamond shape is clearly not a cloud. the craziest thing is i never even saw them when i took the photo. of course, the window was down so i had ind in my eyes, and i wasn't lookng for weid objects when i took the photo. aftter the party night, i couldn't sleep wel and woke up from 2 "nighmares" becuase i was scared f aliens. i thought i saw people walking in the room i was staying in, but they were dreams. sometimes i think i see people or weird see throguh things in my room when i am in that weird in between realm between sleep and wakefulness. i have always been interested in ufo stuff, and had some dreams years and years ago. but honestly, i haven't thought abotu it in years, and i wasn't thinking about ufos or aliens on this trip...Until i saw the weid phtoo. i can hardly believe i took that shot! so, pleae investigate the photos or yourself and let me know what you find out.  i can email you the original phtoo wihotuu the contrast and cropping. but i am at my friends house in atlanta and my computer won't get online, so i had to send the email versions i emailed he form my trip.
content.summary: Ii saw these in a photo i took, but not until the day after when i was uploading them to my computer

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the westminster fireworks display with my wife on 104th and church ranch. i looked to my right (east) and saw an orange oval shaped light moved in a downward angle. it stopped and just sat there. i originally thought it to be a plane coming out of dia and that the angle was just an optical illusion. but then it stopped and just sat in place. i tried to judge the distance and i put it over about 104th and federal or maybe 104th and washington. i sat there watching it and it faded out for a moment and then came back in the same location. a second light (identical to the first) swooped in from the right hand side very quickly and stopped instantly, directly next to the first light in a vertical line. at this point, i had my wife start looking for the video mode on our camera. directly following, a third light appeared coming in the same manner as the second (same approach pattern, same direction, same speed. it stopped suddenly next to the other two lights and the three lights formed a vertical line. after about a minute of them sitting in a line. the first light moved in a circular pattern over the second light and the third light moved in between the two lights. it would be similar as the first and third light were chasing each other or 'playing tag' as the second light sat motionless. by this time, i had just gotten the second camera out of the car and started trying to take a video. the battery was dead on the camera so it shut off on me as the first and third light moved off in the direction the lights had originally come from. i managed to get the camera to work for a few seconds and caught the third light as it was leaving. unfortunately, when reviewing the video, it simply looks like an orange light in the distance just turned off.

now, i can't really say what the objects were but i can tell you what it wasn't. currently, there are no aircraft that can move like that, to my knowledge. they moved very quickly, in tight patterns, and stopped instantly. i can tell you it wasn't distant fireworks, because they cant stay in the air and form perfect vertical lines. i can tell you it wasn't a spotlight of any kind because the lights were orange in color and very bright (indicating they were powered units) unlike a spotlight which just reflects off of cloud cover and can only be seen brightly on a cloudy night.

anyway, i am hoping that out of the thousands of people outside watching fireworks in that area on july 4th, that someone caught it on video and just hasn't come forward with it yet.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Three orange ovals

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were up earlt taking the dogs outside in our front yard.  i was looking at the sky towards the southeast.  i noticed a star-like object moving quickly towards the north.  at first i thought sattelite, but then i noticed another light right behind it.  i pointed out the object to my wife.  we watched it move to the north, then turned 90 degrees on its axis and faded into the distance quickly.  was moving very fast & what appeared very high up.
content.summary: 2 star-like lights moved from se to n, close together then turned on axis

content.detailedDescription: It was 12:30 am and i woke up thirsty i went to our kitchen to get a drink of water.A window looks out the back at the sink wich faces a set of trees and back pasture as i looked out the window i was admiring the large full moon through the trees when it dawned on me that we had just had a full moon the week befre so as i looked closer i realized it was slowly moving through the trees i was very excited and ran to wake up my boyfriend who was sleeping on the couch at the time.He got up and looked out proceeded to tell me it was a helicopter in the short amount of time it took me to reach him and return to the window no more than 20 feet there and back it was over our house we have a round circular turn around in our yard with trees in the middle maybe 10 trees in a small cluster where you can go around to get out of our yard anyway i could see this totally silent craft hovering above with multi colored lights on it.I just stood there watching this thing for the next half hourand suddenly i just went to bed.This is where things get crazy in the morning i woke up after having wild realistic dream of 3 aliens (grays )by my bed then going up in ufo then nothing.I honestly thought it was just a dream but when i got to work that morning i was not feeling right my face felt puffy like sunburn and i never go out in sun because i work inside all day and it felt like a red hot poker had been stuffed up my nose and my left ear hurt later when i got home i inserted q-tip in my left ear which had blood on iti kept that q-tip for the longest time just for proof to myself. also when i took a bath that night my whole body stung when i got in the hot water and for a couple weeks after and when i put my hands in cold water it literely felt like my skin was peeling off and my skin would welt up where the water hit it like acid or something and last of all my hair started turning gray more like white at 38yrs old never had it before i have new white hair growth out the side of my head that was facing object its now 5 inches long mixed in with my real hair very strange.I dont understand what happened but without a doubt something did and now im afraid they are goung to come back someday to take back what ever they put in me.I want to go be hypnotized but maybe not rembering everything is my bodies way of dealing with the trauma.I wish i had someone to talk to i feel alone.
content.summary: I witnessed a sphere like object in my backyard w/ interaction involved

content.detailedDescription:
In case of consideration of my holiday pictures i saw, there is something!

there is a small spot on the photo (please look on the left side) and if one increases it and enlargedly one sees that it concerns a disc. i never saw any like this. i don't know what it is, but it's no bird and no plane - that's sure.
content.summary: In case of consideration of my holiday pictures i saw, there is something!

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 25 neighbors were shooting fireworks in the street.  we saw a circle shaped object, which i initially thought were the embers or remains of a large firework moving across the sky.  however, it did not fade as the other embers did and was too large and too high in the sky to be a firework.  aircraft landing at iah fly over the area also, but in a different direction.  one person thought it could have been a helicopter, (he owns a large telescope and does lots of space photography) but there was absolutely no sound as the aircraft were making as they flew over and it definately was the color of glowing embers.  it could have been an aircraft on fire it was so bright and the color the exact same as such.  the object moved on a very straight path and eventally faded from view.
content.summary: Fire-colored noiseless sphere moving southwest to north.

content.detailedDescription:
We were returning home and were approaching the light at 29th ave and speer blvd.  i was the passenger, and i saw a large white fireball with red or orange around the edge streaking downward from the sky at a very fast rate of speed.  the large, center white light of it was very bright.  i pointed it out to my husband, and he only saw the white smoke trail that it left behind.

the smoke trail remained in the sky for about 10 minutes.  we tried to follow it to see if something had crashed.  i estimate that if something did crash, it landed around north westminster or somewhere north of that.  the light was fading, night was quickly setting in, and the smoke trail was dispersing.  despite losing track of the smoke trail because of the dark, we kept going.  we drove north and west as far as superior, but we were unable to find any evidence of something that had crashed.

i seriously felt like it was low enough to the ground, large enough, and such a tremendous fireball that it would have made impact somewhere.

my husband was disappointed to not see the fireball, but he definitely tracked the smoke trail in the sky with me.

i hope someone else saw it.  please let me know if this was a meteor or something else.
content.summary: Large white fireball in the sky northwest of denver, it left a white smoke trail that we tried to follow

content.detailedDescription:
7/5/2008
strange grey chupacabra creature spotted in holly michigan:

on saturday july 5, 2008 at approximately 4:41am, i witnessed a strange creature as i drove south on n. holly road towards holly michigan. this event lasted 9-10 seconds. this incident occurred when i was under a mile away from grange hall road. i was coming back from dropping off a volunteer that i work with at an art center in davison. i didn't drink anything and wasn't on any medication or illegal drugs. i was drinking soda and i didn't feel that tired even though it was late. 
my speed was slower than the posted limit, about 45 on mph, and my brights on. i do this so i can be prepared when a deer decides to cross my path. no other vehicles were present.

as i was driving, i slowed down because there appeared to be a very large 
creature digging in someone's trash next to the right sight of the road. 
it was located 20-25 feet away from my car. i began to slow down to get a better look. this thing was really tall and too huge to be any 'average' animal that i normally see in roadside trash bins at night. my first thought that came to mind was, "what is it??" i remember calling out words of animals in my head to determine what this thing could be. i thought, "rat no to big..Kangaroo? its grey! red eyes..Rabbit..No.Not a cat..It jumps and leaps kind of like a rabbit...I don't know what i'm looking at..Can't be a chupacabra??..Could it..In michigan??"

this creature was holding a piece of trash..Didn't appear to have paws..
more slender hand-like. it had huge, round and red glowing eyes. 
it reacted and looked kind of surprised to see me as if it thought
no one will ever find out that it existed. that was my impression.
it's eyes just stared at my vehicle while holding onto a piece of
trash for nearly 4 seconds. its triangular like grey face reminded 
me of a dog but it was more pointer and triangular towards the end 
of the nose and mouth. its presence didn't seem ordinary and those
gigantic glowing red eyes made me feel something was out of 
place here.

it's ears were large and rounded sort of like a mouse. its arms
were bendable and closer to its body then its long flexible legs. 
the body was heavier in the bottom and kind of 
reminded me of a kangaroo body but he was completely grey. maybe, 
grey short haired fur i am not sure, but the body was definitely 
grey in color. it had a skinny tail that was similar in appearance
to a rat's tail but it was much longer and slightly wider. i barely 
noticed the creature's tail until it maneuvered out of the way from the
garbage can. 

in summary, this is the way the creature reacted when i came upon it.
i noticed the creature digging in the garbage and it was holding
a piece of trash. it stared at me for 3-4 seconds then dropped the
trash forcefully like a human would with both hands. it was
standing upright and appeared to be over 3 feet tall in height. 
the creature bent down to the ground and jumped forward on all fours 
then got up a bit and turn to the left to aim for the woods. it 
reached for the ground again with its front arms and jumped forward 
with its back legs swinging in front of it like a rabbit. 

the creature didn't make any sounds that i could hear even with my windows
open and it didn't try to attack me or hiss at me. when the event
was over i wanted to turn around and find out what that thing was.
i knew that would not be a good idea. my gut tells me that this
thing had to be a chupacabra. i looked up a chupacabra on the
internet the next day discovered a photo that was taken by
a rancher in 2004 that shot and killed one. the creature in that
photo looked very similar to the one i witnessed, except, the dead
animal had less flesh on its bones and i couldn't see slender hands but
it was hard to tell from the photo. i was planning on getting some 
land so i could let my pet cat out at night but now there is a change 
of plans.
content.summary: Strange grey chupacabra creature spotted in holly michigan:

content.detailedDescription:
My son, age 39, and two friends, were outside talking, when my son saw what he said looked like a firefly moving from some trees across the ground to a nearby lilac bush. fireflies are quite rare in this region. he said that it then started to get brighter and he said 'walk with me,' to his 2 friends who were facing the opposite direction and had not seen the 'item'. the friends simply thought he wanted to talk more privately, away from other people gathered outside for a birthday party.

when they came around to the side of the bush, it suddenly grew to the size of a baseball, while at the same time turning a bright blue. at this point the other 2 men saw the thing while it was still at the base of the bushes and were quite startled by it, and it suddenly zoomed across the open field, went over a parked abandoned school bus and into the sky in a southwest direction. all with no sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small and yellow like a firefly with sudden change to blue/white and increase in size to baseball size.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at a family gathering on westler lake (north east indiana, south of lagrange) enjoying the evening a shooting fireworks with the kids.  it was approx. 10:30 p.M. the sky was crystal clear.  i turned and looked up towards the eastern sky and saw two red lights moving very fast going north to south in a horizontal direction.  these red lights shifted their direction sharply upward and faded out of sight.  it looked as if they were chasing each other.  this all happened in a matter of seconds.  i asked out loud, "did any one see that?"  my daughter and her boyfriend both saw the lights.  i thought to myself, wow!  what was that?  i've never seen anything like that before.  i described what i saw.  my wife commented that she tried to get my attention shortly before because she had seen the same strange lights.  i didn't hear her as usual (ha).  however, she stated that she saw four red objects.  they too moved in a group and shot out of sight.

folks could say that it was a roman candle or some sort of firework.  but the precision of the movement, the change in direction, and depth of field of both objects makes me believe different.  very cool experience.  i do not know what i saw but i know that it was not fireworks.  my wife feels the same.  i have been left with the image running through my mind. very curious.
content.summary: Red object seen crossing sky by multiple people

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling westbound on hwy 71 in austin, tx at approximately 7:50pm on the way home from dinner.  i spotted a reddish object, top to bottom in length more so than side to side, in the distance that was alone in the horizon apart from any other stars, moon, or sun -- on the lefthand side (sw from hwy 71).  it appeared to be larger than the planet mars when viewable but as mentioned, longer from top to bottom.  it was very discernable from any trees or building objects and was viewable unobstructed for the full duration of 5-7 minutes (along with the next object) .  after spotting the object, i then noticed what apparantly was a plane following the same direction with a short vapor trail that was obviously a reddish coloration very distinct from the typical white.  it was easily in contrast of the bluish near dusk sky.  it continued in the same direction of the initial object (for aproximately 3-5 min.) and eventually became smaller to the point that it became the same size as the initial object.  as mentioned, it was intially spotted to be similar to your typical plane with a vapor trail, only distinctly reddish in color and shorter in length.  the trail maintained existance until the object eventually became the same size as the initial object and then disappeared.  this was far and beyond any interpretation of a plane with its vapor trail or any other way of the sun reflecting off the coloration of a white vapor trail.  it was extremely distinct and short in length almost to the point of a large flame projecting from the object as opposed to vapor trail.
content.summary: Object with red vapor trail against dusk blue sky.

content.detailedDescription:
June 24, 2008: my girlfriend called me outside to look at something in the night sky. she usually busts my balls about seeing ufos cause i'm basically a fanatic and am constantly looking, but anyway, i go outside and sure enough i saw something. at first, i thought it was just a helicopter going to one of the local hospitals in the area cause at night, they tend to fly by with red and white lights. however, this was no helicopter for it made no sound. i continued to watch this ufo and its red and white lights. it either remained stationary or moved very slowly. then, all of a sudden, another one of these red and white lighted objects appeared. i could not make out the size or shape of them, but it was basically in a horizontal pattern of red, white, red. before i knew it, there were four of these objects, some of which were moving around almost doings laps, some of which did not. i went walking around to get a better view and then i saw one very huge white lighted object almost coming toward me getting brighter and brighter before it just disappeared. when this object disappeared, the red and white ones did so too. for my first ufo sighting, it was quite incredible.

june 25, 2008: i figured maybe what i saw last night could turn out to be like a "scranton lights" kind of thing the next, so i went outside around 10:00pm and sure enough, i saw saw something again...Only this time, i saw just one red and white lighted object over by where the scranton/wilkes-barre international airport is. it remained stationary for a while. then, the freakiest part of it all, i saw a plane heading in the airport/ufo's direction and thought to myself, this could be very interesting. i wish i could have been that pilot. anyway, as the plane was approaching the airport/ufo, what looked like a shooting star, passed almost through the plane out of nowhere. then, the ufo over the airport disappeared and another red and white light object flew over my house only to disappear in the distance. was that shooting star thing a shooting star or was it ufo related? i really think it was the latter. it was insane to see.
content.summary: Ufo appearances in pa (6/24/08 & 6/25/08)

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:45 a craft with 2 lights hovered soundless over my house. i was jumping on my trampoline and my friend nate noticed the object. it appeared to be a hot air balloon. after i zoomed in on my camera it appeared to be something i've never saw before.. unfortunately i was unable to get a picture of the ufo because the camera's batteries died on me.  when we saw it we were  so scared and when it went behind the trees by my house it disappeared..........................Around an hour later it came back out and there were the towns fireworks and when they started it dissapeared behind the coal mountain.  email me at nate8754@yahoo.Com my name is alek and if you have seen anything of this nature please e-mail me! thank yuo.
content.summary: 2 lights on a cylinder shaped craft shamokin,pa (hexagon)

content.detailedDescription:
On july 2, 2008 at 3:00pm after being informed of severe thunderstorms about to enter the southwest area of greenville michigan, i stepped outside with my canon eos 40d digital camera to catch some images of storm clouds and possibly some rotation from the approaching storm. i took several digital images of the storm clouds before being forced inside by the heavy rain and wind gusts from the storm. my only intensions were to capture digital images of the storm and nothing else. after the storm left the area, i took the compactflash card from my camera and inserted the card into my card reader in my computer. i downloaded the digital image files into adobe photoshop cs3 bridge. i took the compactflash card out of the card reader and put the card back into my canon eos 40d camera and reformatted the compactflash card for storage of new digital images.

on the afternoon of july 5, 2008, i started to review the digital images from the storm from the afternoon of july 2, 2008. as i started to enlarge each digital image file, i noticed an odd object that appeared on the right side of the trees across from the condos near my apartment. i enlarge the object trying to see if i could make out what the object was. i sat at my computer and stared at my lcd display in total disbelief. then i started to check other digital images taken about the same time and i found another object near the storm clouds in another file. i enlarged that one and found an object that appears to be coming out from one of the storm clouds.

i had no intentions of trying to capture digital images of strange objects in the sky as my original intent was only to try to capture interesting cloud formations to send into one of our local television stations in our area. these photos are 100% original and we not altered in any way except for cropping and enlarging the images to try and determine what they actually were. i know this object is not a conventional aircraft anyone around this area has observed before. i have my own impression as what this object appears to be but as of now, i will not divulge my thoughts to anyone until further study has been completed.
content.summary: Object appeared in phot i took of the storm front about to hit the greenville area.

content.detailedDescription: Five of us were walking down a road named jean anne off jewell in washington, mi, running east to west, looking out for fireworks, eyes to the sky.  we were catching glimpses of these fireworks through trees and then we'd come to a clearing for a yard and get a good view but we were taking a walk, when i saw an object in the sky.  there was no blinking, just two lights at first when i saw it moving from ne to sw, and it's size was about the size of an aspirin.  the image i've included with this post looks like a saucer only because there was a separation of the light sources, they moved together, and the light intensity fanned out from the origin.  as it got closer to us i could see that there was a gap of some kind between them, it got bigger so i could tell.  as for altitude, i'd say it was twice as high as most fireworks in the sky at the time.  we all watched it, and looked back and forth between that and a typical airplane with a red blinking light way up, blinking really slow.
content.summary: Disc-like, white top, blue bottom
